channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crucial Court Hearing Begins in Harvard Case Against Trump
item.description: A hearing in Boston on Monday is expected to shape the future of negotiations between the White House and the nation’s oldest university.

item.title: Disabled Americans Fear What Medicaid Cuts Could Do to Them
item.description: The White House says roughly $1 trillion in Medicaid cuts won’t limit home- and community-based care. Health care experts disagree.

item.title: The world keeps millions of vaccines on ice. Is it worth it?
item.description: It costs nearly $100 million a year to maintain global stockpiles of vaccines for Ebola, cholera, meningitis and yellow fever in case of emergency. A ...

item.title: 2 Deadly Shootings in 2 Days Show Dangers That Now Come With Aid in Gaza
item.description: On Saturday, Israeli soldiers shot Palestinians near an Israel-backed food site. On Sunday, they fired at people gathering near a U.N. convoy. Both in...

item.title: COMIC: Exploring the ocean's wonderous, mysterious depths
item.description: Did you know that we know less about the sea than we do about space? With this comic, we explore some of what scientists do know about Earth's ocean.

item.title: Texas Republicans want to redraw congressional districts in special session
